title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mark Cuban on Luka Relationship, Business & Media Future
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mark Cuban on Luka Relationship, Business & Media Future
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why Jimmy G is more in demand than Baker despite uncertainty after surgery on his throwing shoulder, what Urban Meyer and Zion Williamson have in common, and why college hoops has fallen so far off the national radar.

Then, Mavs owner - and host of Shark Tank - Mark Cuban joins Colin to discuss how his groundbreaking new pharma company is helping make prescription drugs affordable (19:00), how Luka Doncic has matured since entering the NBA (20:00), how today's young stars are different than past generations (23:00), how he's connected with his kids using Tik Tok (26:00), the future of consuming sports media going (29:00), what NBA rule he would change (32:00), and why he's been so impressed with Luka handling the off the court aspect of NBA stardom (40:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
